Text.value: Pressure Sensor IP67, with display, 0..50 bar
BDC1 Switch Point Delay On time
BDC1 Switch Point Delay Off time
BDC2 Switch Point Delay On time
BDC2 Switch Point Delay Off time

Analogue lower limit 2. [ASP2] must be smaller than [AEP2]. Please take into account the current [AEP2]. For information on the minimum hysteresis [ASP2] - [AEP2] please refer to the operating instructions.

Analogue upper limit 2. [AEP2] must be greater than [ASP2]. Please take into account the current [ASP2]. For information on the minimum hysteresis [ASP2] - [AEP2] please refer to the operating instructions.
